name: Electromaim
description: Electromaim's solution produces clean energy from the water distribution systems of urban buildings. Our unique approach to capture a vast but hidden wasted energy stream not only contributes to decarbonization to fight climate change but also addresses the most important target: existing building infrastructure.
one_liner: Electromaim's solution produces clean energy from the water distribution systems of urban buildings. Our unique approach to capture a vast but hidden wasted energy stream not only contributes to decarbonization to fight climate change but also addresses the most important target: existing building infrastructure.
location: New York City, New York, United States
